summary: Extended /refresh command with --projects mode for surveying and cleaning up old Claude Code project files. Created claude-project-cleanup.sh script, updated skill-refresh with dual-mode execution, and documented new commands in refresh.md and CLAUDE.md.

artifacts.summary: Bash script for surveying and cleaning project files with age threshold, dry-run, and force modes
Extended skill with projects mode detection and execution logic
Updated command documentation with new syntax and examples
Implementation summary with verification results and usage examples

next_steps: Use /refresh --projects to survey and clean up old project files
